Text: I can't run this on sgk 4.40.4 either pleasssssssse heeelp

For those on SGK 4.40, a friend of mine has confirmed it is not compatible with PS2 classics and PSP Minis, i would recommend updating your CFW to Rogero or Rebug as they both work flawless with some of these new methods.  Or wait until SGK updates their FW.
Suikoden ii works perfectly on CFW 3.55 Kmeaw
